3:
Let them praise his name with dancing;
\q let them sing praises to him with tambourine and harp.
5:
Let the godly rejoice in victory;
\q let them sing for joy on their beds.
6:
May the praises of God be in their mouths
\q and a two-edged sword in their hand
\q
7:
to execute vengeance on the nations
\q and acts of punishment on the peoples.
8:
They will bind their kings with chains
\q and their nobles with iron shackles.
\q
9:
They will execute the judgment that is written.
\q This will be an honor for all his faithful ones.
\q Praise Yahweh.
